gnat.comparison
Class CompareGeneAndTextContextModels

java.lang.Object
  gnat.comparison.CompareContextModels
      gnat.comparison.CompareGeneAndTextContextModels
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CompareGeneAndTextContextModels
extends CompareContextModels
implements java.io.Serializable

Used to compare a context model of a text against a context model of a gene. It uses a GOTermSimilarity to compare GO codes for texts against GO codes for genes.

See Also:

cos0 = x * y / (||x|| * ||y||)
A return value of zero means that both vectors are orthogonal.

getCosineSimilarity

public float getCosineSimilarity(ContextVector cv1,
                                 ContextVector cv2)
Calculates the cosine of the angle between both vectors as a measure of similarity.
cos0 = x * y / (||x|| * ||y||)
A return value of zero means that both vectors are orthogonal.

Parameters:
cv1 -
cv2 -
Returns:

getNormalizedOverlap

public float getNormalizedOverlap(ContextVector cv1,
                                  ContextVector cv2)
Returns the overlap between both context vectors (number of shared elements). Normalizes this absolute number with the length of the shortest of the two vectors.

Parameters:
cv1 -
cv2 -
Returns:
